variables.input:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded"
| summarize nr=count(), by:{app_name}
| fieldsRemove nr

0.title: Sync events by event-type
0.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "sync")
| fields timestamp, event.type, app_name, owner, status
| summarize count(), by:{event.type}

1.title: Deployment events by status per selected application

2.title: Successful deployments
2.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded" and app_name == $application
| summarize count()

query.expression:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded" and app_name == $application and owner == $team
| summarize count()

3.title: Failed deployments
3.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "failed" and app_name == $application 
| summarize count()

4.title: Guardian Validation Results

5.title: Guardians Available

11.title: Guardian Validations
11.query:
fetch bizEvents
| filter event.type == "guardian.validation.finished" 
| fields timestamp, Guardian=guardian.name, Descr=guardian.description,Status=validation.status, ObjectiveSummary=validation.summary, trigger=validation.workflow.trigger_type

14.title: Successful deployments
14.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded"
| summarize count()

query.expression:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded" and app_name == $application and owner == $team
| summarize count()

15.title: Failed deployments
15.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "failed"
| summarize count()

16.title: Deployment events by status

18.title: Sync events by event-type
18.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "sync") and app_name == $application
| fields timestamp, event.type, app_name, owner, status 
| summarize count(), by:{event.type}

20.title: Release Information per PGIs
20.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance  
| fields Name=entity.name, Id=id, tags=tags, instanceOf = instance_of[dt.entity.process_group]
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)

| fieldsRemove tags, t

22.title: Release Information per PGs
22.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
//| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, tags, Instances = instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)
| lookup [
    fetch bizevents
    | filter contains(event.type, "deployment") OR contains
    | fields timestamp, event.type, status, entityId
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:entityId
| fieldsRemove tags, t, lookup.entityId
| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, Version = Version, Stage = Stage, Product = Product, Owner=Owner, Instances=instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance], EventTimestamp = lookup.timestamp, EventType = lookup.event.type, EventStatus = lookup.status

23.title: Successful Deployment Events

query.expression:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded" and app_name == $application and owner == $team
| summarize count()

24.title: Single Deployment Events
24.query:
fetch events
| filter event.type == "CUSTOM_DEPLOYMENT"
| fields timestamp, event.name, dt.entity.process_group_instance.name, app_name, owner

27.content: #### Release Inventory (based on Process Group Instances)

28.title: Release Information per PGs per application
28.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
//| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, tags, Instances = instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)
| lookup [
    fetch bizevents
    | filter contains(event.type, "deployment") OR contains
    | fields timestamp, event.type, status, entityId
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:entityId
| fieldsRemove tags, t, lookup.entityId
| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, Version = Version, Stage = Stage, Product = Product, Owner=Owner, Instances=instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance], EventTimestamp = lookup.timestamp, EventType = lookup.event.type, EventStatus = lookup.status
| filter Product == $application

29.title: Single Deployment Events per application
29.query:
fetch events
| filter event.type == "CUSTOM_DEPLOYMENT"
| fields timestamp, event.name, dt.entity.process_group_instance.name, app_name, owner
| filter app_name == $application

30.title: Successful Deployment Events per application
30.query:
fetch events
| filter event.type == "CUSTOM_DEPLOYMENT"
| filter app_name == $application
| Summarize Deployments=count(), by:{event.type}

query.expression:
fetch bizevents
| filter contains(event.type, "deployment")
| filter status == "succeeded" and app_name == $application and owner == $team
| summarize count()

34.title: # Process Group Instances
34.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance  
| fields Name=entity.name, Id=id, tags=tags, instanceOf = instance_of[dt.entity.process_group]
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)

| fieldsRemove tags, t  
| summarize releases=count()

35.title: # Process Groups
35.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
//| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, tags, Instances = instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)
| lookup [
    fetch bizevents
    | filter contains(event.type, "deployment") OR contains
    | fields timestamp, event.type, status, entityId
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:entityId
| fieldsRemove tags, t, lookup.entityId
| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, Version = Version, Stage = Stage, Product = Product, Owner=Owner, Instances=instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance], EventTimestamp = lookup.timestamp, EventType = lookup.event.type, EventStatus = lookup.status
|summarize releases=count()

40.title: # Process Groups per application
40.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
//| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, tags, Instances = instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance]
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)
| lookup [
    fetch bizevents
    | filter contains(event.type, "deployment") OR contains
    | fields timestamp, event.type, status, entityId
    ], sourceField:id, lookupField:entityId
| fieldsRemove tags, t, lookup.entityId
| fields Name = entity.name, Id = id, Version = Version, Stage = Stage, Product = Product, Owner=Owner, Instances=instantiates[dt.entity.process_group_instance], EventTimestamp = lookup.timestamp, EventType = lookup.event.type, EventStatus = lookup.status
| filter Product == $application
|summarize releases=count()

42.title: # PGIs per application
42.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance  
| fields Name=entity.name, Id=id, tags=tags, instanceOf = instance_of[dt.entity.process_group]
//| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release_build_version*") 
| filter matchesValue(tags, "*release*") 
| fieldsAdd t = toString(tags)
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_VERSION:' LD:Version '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_STAGE:' LD:Stage '\", ' LD " 
//| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_BUILD_VERSION:' LD:Build '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]DT_RELEASE_PRODUCT:' LD:Product '\", ' LD " 
| parse t, "LD '[Environment]dt.owner:' LD:Owner '\", ' LD "
| filter isNotNull(Version)

| fieldsRemove tags, t  
| summarize PGIs=count(), by:{Product}
